oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Bushman terms for various degrees of relationship. Given by /han=kasso (L VIII.-31. 8788-8790, 32. 8792 and 8793, 8845-8847). Terms for various relationships by marriage. (L VIII.-12. 7067 rev. and 7068 rev., 32. 8794 rev.). Some of these terms seem to be spoken by men or women and apply to relations of different genders and ages. 1) This story is found in Book VIII-32.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Relationships
